page.title: 07EAST MOLESEY
page.content: {East Molesey}is a small town just {south of the River Thames by Hampton {Court Bridge.} Although the residential part of East Molesey stretches far the shopping area remains in the tight nucleus of the original village.{ Many of the local {residents still view East Molesey as a {village}and unlike other nearby areas it certainly does have the "feel" of a close-knit community. Being so{close to the busy tourist {attraction of Hampton Court}has visibly affected E.Molesey. Although there are about 30 shop units in the immediate area{only one}of these is a {general food store.} There are{several {art galleries and antique shops}the proprietors of which readily acknowledge the value of a site so close to a large source of overseas visitors.
